content:
DataGridHeadersVisibility Enum

Definition

Defines constants that specify the visibility of row and column headers in a DataGrid.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public enum DataGridHeadersVisibility
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
DataGridHeadersVisibility
Attributes
FlagsAttribute

Remarks

This enumeration is used by the HeadersVisibility property.

The style of the headers is determined by the RowHeaderStyle and ColumnHeaderStyle properties.

Fields

All

Both row and column headers are visible.
Column

Only column headers are visible.
None

No headers are visible.
Row

Only row headers are visible.
